workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: If editing an existing VRF specify the ID otherwise leave blank for new VRF.

vrf_id.validation_error_text: Parameter vrf_id only accepts integer numbers.

remove_time.name: remove_time
remove_time.description: defaults to -1 for now otherwise takes a unix timestamp

name: remove_vrf
description: removes a VRF (L3VPN) from the network
